about_the_game:
Tired of Hearthstone? Just play Duelfront!

Duelfront is the next-generation card game with innovative, map-based gameplay. It’s fun, fast-paced, and completely free to play. With tons of content and weekly updates, there’s always something new to discover!

Duelfront isn’t your typical card game. Here, every card plays out on a dynamic battlefield. Build your deck, plan your strategy, and outsmart your opponents using a mix of tactical card play and battlefield management.

Got 3 minutes? That’s all you need to jump into a game of Duelfront! Whether you’re on the go or just want a quick round, we’ve stripped out the waiting and focused on delivering fast, exciting gameplay.

Duelfront is totally free to play. Dive in without paying a cent, and you can earn new cards just by playing and mastering the game.

We’ve designed 300+ cards and 50+ locations, each bringing unique challenges and strategies. Not all will be available at launch, but we’ll keep your deck fresh with daily and weekly updates!

Contents include:

  • Beast: Powerful battlecry.

  • Undead: Deathrattle and respawn.

  • Empire: Utilize Auras to buff your forces.

  • Skeleton: Flood the field with low-cost, numerous units.

  • Giant: Deal massive AOE damage and gain immunity to minor attacks.

  • Arcanist: Discard cards strategically to gain benefits.

  • Building: Overwatch fields and provide ongoing effects over time.

  • Plant: Slow growth, but high potential; low damage but great defense.

  • Paladin: Use Divine Shield and Guard to protect your key units.

  • Vampire: High stats but become weaker each turn.

  • Chaos: Unpredictable and fun – random effects that can impact any zone or player!

We’re constantly adding new content—new cards, new game modes, new cosmetics, and exciting events. There’s always something fresh and exciting on the horizon in Duelfront.

Duelfront is being built with you. That means you get to vote on updates and have a direct hand in shaping the game’s future. Every new feature is driven by player feedback. Join the community and make your voice heard!

Wishlist Duelfront now and don't miss out!

We'll release a gameplay demo at Oct 8.
detailed_description:
Hey there

Hello everyone, we're Limit Game Studio.

This is our 23rd game. The first 22 attempts? They all failed. No publishers, no investors — just the two of us, working day and night, searching for a simple, innovative, and fun game that could stand the test of time.

Many times, we wondered: should we keep going? And our answer is the 23rd. This time, we designed a gameplay that’s truly addictive. Every day, we played it, improved it, and now, we're finally bringing it to you.

We’re confident you’ll love it just as much as we do.

name: Duelfront

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2180 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 430 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 430 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
